name: WP DealPixel Ads
author: jw

sections.description:
Allows you to insert the latest deals from dealpixel.com in your sidebar. Easily earn money by joining the DealPixel affiliate network and driving traffic to dealpixel.com! Make 25% off of each sale. A lot better than amazon, ebay, google ads, or most other affiliate networks. Find out more here.

A few of the features:

  • Choose how many deals to show
  • Hides the affiliate link

More about Dealpixel.com:

Dealpixel.com is a daily deal site for creative and web professionals. They offer huge discounts on things like icons, wordpress themes, stock images, online courses, and more. They also have a very generous affiliate program where they pay 25%.
sections.faq:
Why should I contribute or leave the powered by link?

Because you’re a cool person and like to show your appreciation.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • No changes, first released version.

1.1

  • Fixed division by zero bug.
